title: Veteran Discipline
description: Our founder Richard Faria's military service instilled commitment, follow-through, and never leaving a job half-done. That discipline drives how we run our roofing company and how we serve you.

title: Skin in the Game
description: We run Koi Roofing and Solar. Every strategy we recommend is one we use ourselves. We don't give advice we wouldn't take.

title: Coast to Coast
description: We serve contractors across all 50 states. Whether you're in a big city or small town, we understand local markets and how to dominate them.

title: Straight Talk
description: No jargon, no runaround. We tell you what's working, what's not, and what we're doing about it. Contractor to contractor, no BS.

title: Results Over Reports
description: We don't hide behind dashboards and metrics. We care about one thing: did your phone ring with qualified leads? Everything else is noise.
